duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new business through prospecting activities and generating account growth with quality meetings.
Secure new business to achieve individual sales and customer satisfaction goals.
Actively network and represent the company at professional group events to discuss and position products for specification in building plans.
Engage in a consultative sales approach to recommend solutions that influence customer buying needs.
Ensure accurate quotes and orders in accordance with company processes.
Respond to customer concerns and coordinate resources to resolve issues while striving for first-time resolution.
Maintain expertise on products/services, stay abreast of the competitive landscape, and educate customers on installation guidelines.
Thank clients and act as their central point of contact for ongoing needs.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure successful after-sale service requirements and installations.
Interact with Account Receivable department to address potential billing/payment issues.
Use Strong salesforce systems tools capabilities to manage all customer interactions and proactively communicate with customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from four-year college or university; or two to four years related experience, including commercial sales and technical product expertise, or equivalent combination of education and experience/expertise.
